content: lupine hat is a snug fitting colorwork beanie knit from the bottom up this design was created in collaboration with colorado indie dyer delight ali pate of road trip sock yarn to showcase her signature speckles and range of colors but it can be knit in your choice of fingering or sport weight yarn inspired by the endless range of lupine shades yardage required main color appr 200 yards of fingering or sport weight yarn contrast color appr 50 yards of fingering or sport weight yarn currently written for one adult size with an expanded range of sizes coming soon
